sentences.en: "For God's sake," Michael said melodramatically, "Whatever you do, don't look down."
sentences.cn: “看在上帝的份上，”迈克尔煞有介事地说，“不管你做什么，千万别低头。”

sentences.en: "For heaven's sake!" Dot expostulated. "They're cheap and they're useful."
sentences.cn: “拜托！”多特反驳道，“它们又便宜又管用。”

sentences.en: "Run, Katherine. For pity's sake run!" he screamed.
sentences.cn: “跑，凯瑟琳，快跑！”他尖叫道。

sentences.en: After all, we are doing this for the sake of Singaporeans.
sentences.cn: 其实，这项政策也是以新加坡人的利益为出发点。

sentences.en: Carol managed a few proper snivels for the sake of appearance.
sentences.cn: 为了做做样子，卡萝尔适时地抽了几下鼻子。

sentences.en: For Gawd's sake hurry up!
sentences.cn: 看在上帝的份上快点吧！

sentences.en: For God's sake shut up. I can't hear myself think!
sentences.cn: 看在老天爷的份上，闭嘴吧。吵死我了！

sentences.en: For God's sake stop dithering and make up your mind!
sentences.cn: 看在上帝面上,别再犹豫了,快拿定主意吧!

sentences.en: For goodness sake, why didn't you ring me?
sentences.cn: 天哪，为什么你不给我打电话？

sentences.en: For goodness' sake, just use your common sense!
sentences.cn: 我的老天，你也凭常识想想！

sentences.en: For pity's sake, please stop making so much noise.
sentences.cn: 求求你, 请不要那么吵闹了.

sentences.en: He moved to the seaside for the sake of his health.
sentences.cn: 他为了健康而迁居海滨。

sentences.en: I hope he’s told the truth for his own sake (= because it will be good for him ) .
sentences.cn: 为了他自己好，我希望他已经说出了真相。

sentences.en: I just like car trips for their own sake.
sentences.cn: 我只是单纯地喜欢驾车旅行。

sentences.en: I only went for Kay’s sake.
sentences.cn: 我是为了凯才去的。

sentences.en: I trust you to do a good job for Stan's sake.
sentences.cn: 我拜托你看在斯坦的份上好好干。

sentences.en: If there are people cowboy coding in your company, or even worse—on your team—do everything you can to change that for the sake of your customers.
sentences.cn: 如果在您的公司（或者更糟糕，在您的团队）存在进行牛仔编码的人员，为了客户的利益着想，您应该竭尽全力地改变这种情况。

sentences.en: Keep your voice down, for goodness sake.
sentences.cn: 看在上天的份儿上，小点儿声。

sentences.en: they sat in the back seats for old times' sake.
sentences.cn: 为了怀旧他们坐在后座。

sentences.en: Will somebody for God's sake shut that alarm off.
sentences.cn: 看在上帝的份上，谁去关掉那个闹钟吧。

sentences.en: You've got a computer system, for heaven's sake.
sentences.cn: 天啊，你已经装了计算机系统。

words.tran_cn: 缘由,代表,安宁,顾虑,利益

phrases.tran_cn: 为了怀念往昔，为了老交情，念及旧日情分

trans.tran_cn: 缘故，理由，日本米酒，目的
trans.tran_en: in order to help, improve, or please someone or something
